attributes.action: Not make calories a legal requirement on menus
attributes.additional_details: Vulnerable individuals will be at risk of developing 'calorie based or restrictive' eating issues/ eating disorders due to calories being so present in everyday life. This will also so make the recovery for individuals with 'calorie based or restrictive' issues / disorders more difficult as there will be no way for them to avoid the seeing calories. Individuals who have already recovered from eating issues/ disorders will also be a higher risk of relapse.
attributes.background: I want the UK government to reconsider the decision to make calories a legal requirement on menus.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/602343
